name: The Curse Of Tavros
description:
An adventure indie-style game based on the Minotaur mythology inside a maze tomb.  Story/Lore for The Curse Of Tavros.

You, the main character, who is named Alex Taylor, are an archaeology student who has stumbled across clues to a long-forgotten myth. The myth entails details of the Minotaur and the Daedalus Labyrinth from which the Minotaur lived inside. Following the clues from country to country, you eventually find yourself on Crete, near King Minos' Palace in Knossos. You ultimately reached the area of where the entrance for the tomb was described to be, fully intending for this once of a lifetime archaeology finding to raise your career into fame and legend for being the person the find the labyrinth and possibly find the bodily remains of the Minotaur, which would flip the archaeology world upside down when it comes to mythology and history. You get near the entrance when suddenly the ground beneath you gives way, and you find yourself in the Labyrinth. 

Your goal is to get out whilst collecting your findings and artefacts in this tomb. However, you might not be as alone as you might think you are!
